metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39190 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c in the Linuxkernel before 5.19.6. A denial of service can occur upon binding to analready bound chain.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-39190` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1083-fips - 4.4.0-1083.90
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1083-fips - 4.4.0-1083.90
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-1083-fips - 4.4.0-1083.90
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.4.0-1083-fips - 4.4.0-1083.90
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
